title: Pro Football Hall of Fame: Drew Brees, Larry Fitzgerald among five in Class of 2026

sources.name: ESPN NFL
sources.title: Brees, Fitzgerald make Hall of Fame in first year
sources.description: The Pro Football Hall of Fame will welcome five into its 2026 class, including Drew Brees and Larry Fitzgerald -- who were in their first year of eligibility -- as well as Adam Vinatieri, Luke Kuechly and Roger Craig.

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Pro Football Hall of Fame: Drew Brees, Larry Fitzgerald among five in Class of 2026
sources.description: Running back Roger Craig, linebacker Luke Kuechly and kicker Adam Vinatieri also were elected.
